title: Accessibility problems
description: When I launch the Help view, I need to first click on one of the 'live' areas (e.g. the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame or the content frame) before the tab key starts working.
OB: When I launch the Help view on March 26th, 2002 using Windows 2000, the tab key does not have any effect.
EB: When I launch the Help view on March 26th, 2002 using Windows 2000, pressing the tab key should allow me to navigate through the interactive areas of the Help view.
SR:
1. Launch the Help view on March 26th, 2002 using Windows 2000.
2. Try navigating using the tab key before clicking on any of the 'live' areas (banner with tool buttons, nav frame, content frame).
3. Observe that the tab key does not have any effect on the Help view.
4. Click on one of the 'live' areas.
5. Try navigating using the tab key again.
6. Verify that now the tab key allows you to navigate through the interactive areas of the Help view.
